faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The subject focuses on the understanding and practical application of marketing strategies and brand communication in various business environments. Students learn to analyze marketing and communication problems and develop solutions that meet their needs. The course also covers various marketing tactics, such as advertising, sales promotion, public relations and social media, and teaches how to apply these tactics effectively. At the end of the course, students develop a marketing and communication strategy suitable for their idea.
description.et: Aine keskendub turundusstrateegiate ja brändi kommunikatsiooni mõistmisele ja praktilisele rakendamisele erinevates ärikeskkondades.  Õpilased õpivad analüüsima turundus- ja kommunikatsiooniprobleeme ning töötama välja lahendusi, mis vastavad nende vajadustele. Aine käigus käsitletakse ka turunduse erinevaid taktikaid, nagu näiteks reklaam, müügiedendus, avalikud suhted ja sotsiaalmeedia, ning õpetatakse, kuidas neid taktikaid tõhusalt rakendada. Aine lõpuks töötavad tudengid välja oma ideele sobiva turundus- ja kommunikatsioonistrateegia.

objectives.en: The purpose of the subject is to introduce the fundamentals of marketing and brand communication and to provide an overview of various strategies and tactics that can be used in the planning and implementation of marketing activities and brand communication.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on tutvustada turunduse ja brändi kommunikatsiooni põhialuseid ning anda ülevaade erinevatest strateegiatest ja taktikatest, mida saab kasutada turundustegevuste ja brändi kommunikatsiooni kavandamisel ja rakendamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: The student: *understands the nature and importance of marketing strategies and communication in a business environment; *analyzes marketing and communication problems and solves them effectively; *creates a marketing and communication strategy suitable for their idea, presents it and implements it in their creative project.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilane: *mõistab turundusstrateegiate ja  kommunikatsiooni olemust ja tähtsust ärikeskkonnas; *analüüsib turundus- ja kommunikatsiooniprobleeme ning lahendab neid tulemuslikult; *loob oma ideele sobiva turundus- ja kommunikatsioonistrateegia, esitleb seda ning rakendab oma loovprojektis.

notes.et: Aine õppejõud ja läbiviija on Anniken Haldna.

independent_work.et: Brand and marketing strategy plan for a student's project. Introductions given throughout the course.

grade_preconditions.en: Participating in 80% in lectures and seminars.
grade_preconditions.et:
Assessment Criteria:

Attendance and Participation: Active participation in lectures, group discussions, and practical assignments is required.

Final Presentation: Students will develop and present a comprehensive brand and marketing strategy plan for a project. This presentation will serve as the final assessment and must demonstrate an understanding of marketing principles, digital strategies, branding, and communication techniques learned throughout the course.

arvestatud.en: Student has attended 80% of the class and has completed the final marketing and branding presentation as well as in class assignments.
arvestatud.et: Student has attended 80% of the class and has completed the final marketing and branding presentation as well as in class assignments.

mittearvestatud.en: Student has missed more than 20% of lectures and seminars and hasn't completed the final plan and presentation.
mittearvestatud.et: Student has missed more than 20% of lectures and seminars and hasn't completed the final plan and presentation.

mitteilmunud.en: Student has not participated in class.
mitteilmunud.et: Student has not participated in class.

topic.et: Module 1: Introduction to Marketing and Brand Communication Fundamentals

description.en:
Introduction of the course and final assignment. Getting to know the students expectations and previous knowledge in marketing and brand communications. 

Theory: Key definitions in Marketing Strategies and Brand Communication. Students will learn to differentiate between these two concepts and understand how they complement each other. 

As part of the class, students will conduct research within their chosen industry or project area to explore how brand communication and marketing are perceived from the customer’s perspective. They will analyse existing strategies to gain insights and inspiration, which will benefit them in the development of their own marketing and communication plans.

By the end of the model 1, students will grasp how marketing strategies and brand communication work together to support project success.
description.et: 10.30-12.00; 12.30-14.00. Kõik loengud toimuvad veebis (Moodle/ Zoom / Teams). Aine õppejõud on Anniken Haldna

topic.et: Module 2: Marketing concepts 4P and new 4P, market and target group.

description.en: In this module, students will explore the foundational 4Ps of Marketing (Product, Price, Place, and Promotion) and how they shape traditional marketing strategies. The course will then introduce the New 4Ps (People, Processes, Programs, and Performance), which adapt these principles for modern, customer-centric marketing. Students will also learn how to conduct market analysis and identify target groups, understanding how to segment audiences and tailor marketing efforts to meet their needs. This module lays the groundwork for creating effective, well-rounded marketing strategies in any project.

topic.et: Module 3: principles of branding, developing a brand identity for your project, effective communication strategies

description.en:
Principles of branding: Learn how to create a distinct brand identity through mission, values, and unique selling propositions (USPs).
Developing brand identity: Build a cohesive brand identity for your project, including logos, colors, messaging, and tone of voice.
Effective communication strategies: How to craft impactful messages, select the right channels, and maintain consistent, authentic communication with your target audience to build trust and engagement.

Guest lecturer from marketing agency.

topic.et: Module 4: digital marketing and social media strategies,

description.en: Guest lector session on personal branding.

topic.et: Final presentations of "My master marketing strategy and brand communication plan"
